messages.subject: Re: Ready for a new tsuba kantei!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Jim, Hope you had a great trip.  Glad to hear there will be another tsuba kantei soon...but no pressure! Steven ... left, but I will put one together soon.
messages.messageBody:
Hi Jim,

Hope you had a great trip. Glad to hear there will be another tsuba kantei soon...but no
pressure!

Steven


--- In nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com, "Jim Gilbert" <jggilbert@...> wrote:
>

> I'm just back from a trip to Arizona. There wasn't time for a new tsuba kantei before I
left, but I will put one together soon.
>
> Jim

>
> Just thinking that it would be nice to tackle a new kantei problem about now...! I've
very

> considering each of the pieces reviewed thus far. A terrific learning experience, plus
we
> get to see some super tsuba... So, just a gentle nudge here hoping to stir the kantei
> spirits!
>
> Steven

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Ready for a new tsuba kantei!
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Steven, I m just back from a trip to Arizona.  There wasn t time for a new tsuba kantei before I left, but I will put one together soon. Jim Greetings all,
messages.messageBody:
Hi Steven,
I'm just back from a trip to Arizona. There wasn't time for a new tsuba kantei before I left, but I will put one together soon.

Jim



Greetings all,

Just thinking that it would be nice to tackle a new kantei problem about now...! I've very
much enjoyed these, and it's been great to see the thoughts everyone has shared in
considering each of the pieces reviewed thus far. A terrific learning experience, plus we
get to see some super tsuba... So, just a gentle nudge here hoping to stir the kantei
spirits!

Steven



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: Ready for a new tsuba kantei!
messages.msgSnippet: Greetings all, Just thinking that it would be nice to tackle a new kantei problem about now...!  I ve very much enjoyed these, and it s been great to see the
messages.messageBody:
Greetings all,

Just thinking that it would be nice to tackle a new kantei problem about now...! I've very
much enjoyed these, and it's been great to see the thoughts everyone has shared in
considering each of the pieces reviewed thus far. A terrific learning experience, plus we
get to see some super tsuba... So, just a gentle nudge here hoping to stir the kantei
spirits!

Steven
